body:
Honestly Shuten and Kintokis relationship is convoluted. Cant exactly say theyre lovers, Kintoki had feelings for Shuten when she was disguised as a human. But he also saw her as an enemy when she started behaving more like an Oni. His regret in his life was that Raikou and her retainers, Kintoki included, killed Shute 
through foul-play and trickery rather than hinorably but its more out of respect. At this point its more like Kintoki respects but is also concerned about Shuten because of her Oni antics and Shuten is that drunkard ex who still wants to come back. Also she likes rare antiques and Kintoki just so happens to have a special dragon bone in his arm that she wants to protect because she doesnt want it to get damaged since she values beauty.
This is good.

the end is kinda canon, so, thats why you shold never choose thots as waifus

Then make a Kintoki doujin instead lol you niggas acting like a bitch sucking Kintoki's dick, the reason people mad is because she fuck Gudao then go to Kintoki (her real golden boi) like no shit happened. Both of them got played by this cheeky oni
kintoki and shuten is the right ship and must always be put together, also kintoki is one of the best bro servants

Look at all these salty nibbas. Play the game first and you'll understand, if you're lucky, anyway.

Also, expecting a hedonistic demon to not sleep around is naive.
To anyone who doesn't understand why Shuten Douji choses Kintarou, it is because she obsesses with him lol. In the game, she feel for him, but he always try to push her away in a shy/nervous manner.

@crash006 Kintoki aka Kintarou and Shuten Douji are lovers (they were once a enemy though) that's why and he is a adopted child of Raikou if im right that's why you see Raikou always fighting Shuten Douji because she doesn't approve of Shuten Douji or doesn't like her and actually not every servant in FGO has feelings on the MC its mostly the Alters and Servant that didn't have a lovers if im right.
